original_text: We will not return to our homes until each of the people of Israel has gained his inheritance.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 각기 기업을 받기까지 우리 집으로 돌아오지 아니하겠사오며

sentences.original_text: We will not return to our homes
until each of the people of Israel has gained his inheritance.
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성 각 사람이 자기 기업을 얻을 때까지는
